tns:patch.author: mpostelnicu
tns:patch.description: This allows the gate permissions to be mapped to objects that can be identified only by non-long identifiers. One example of such object is AmpFieldsVisibility-FMTemplate pair. In order to assign permissions to a field, you need to assign it to the field-template pair, as this is what uniquely identifies the field inside a template. This allows us to assign different permissions for different Feature Manager templates.

script.lang: ALTER TABLE perm_map MODIFY object_identifier varchar(255);
